name: Storm Area 51 (dubyastudios)
description:
Build your force of Johns, Karen's, Naruto Runners, AntiVax kids, Crackheads and Kyle's. Break through the defenses of Area 51, battle the defenders and discover once and for all if they are hiding evidence of extraterrestrial life. Search buildings and bunkers to discover artifacts and items to help you reach your goal of freeing the Alien visitors and keeping them safe until their ride arrives. During your search you will expose some other secrets of Area 51, some of them deadly. All Aliens must survive. 

Report bugs to us at: dubyastudios@gmail.com

Game Controls:  

Holding Right Mouse Button will allow you to navigate the map view.

Mouse Wheel to zoom in and out

Left click to select units and destinations

Place your unit next to buildings or objects to initiate search

Placement screen:

Single click unit after added and move unit to deployment position

Combat will not start until one of your units breaches the base fence or perimeter
